L

lastTexture - Variable in class sage.scene.state.TextureState
 
Leaf - Class in sage.scene
This class is an abstraction for SceneNodes which are leaves of the gameworld scenegraph; it defines functionality common to all types of scenegraph Leaf nodes.
Leaf(String) - Constructor for class sage.scene.Leaf
Constructs a new Leaf using the specified name and default values specified in the parent (SceneNode) class.
Leaf() - Constructor for class sage.scene.Leaf
Constructs a new Leaf with a default name and default values as specified by Leaf.Leaf(String).
lightGray - Static variable in class sage.util.ColorRGBA
the color gray (.8,.8,.8).
limit - Variable in class sage.ai.behaviortrees.BTRepeat
 
Line - Class in sage.scene.shape
Line defines an object which is a line between two 3D points.
Line() - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Line
Constructs a Line with a default name and with null begin and end points, null color, and zero thickness.
Line(Point3D, Point3D, Color, int) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Line
Constructs a Line with characteristics as specified by the input parameters, which are passed to constructor Line.Line(String,Point3D,Point3D,Color,int) along with a default name.
Line(String, Point3D, Point3D, Color, int) - Constructor for class sage.scene.shape.Line
Constructs a Line with the specified name between the specified points with the specified Color and thickness (line width).
load() - Method in class sage.audio.joal.JOALAudioResource
Load the audio resource into memory.
load(int) - Method in class sage.scene.state.jogl.JOGLTextureState
Loads the specified texture unit on the graphics card with the Texture contained in this JOGLTextureState, if any Texture has been assigned in this JOGLTextureState to the specified unit.
load() - Method in class sage.scene.state.TextureState
Loads the textures in this TextureState into the underlying rendering system, generating mipmaps if appropriate.
load(int) - Method in class sage.scene.state.TextureState
Loads the texture for the given unit into the underlying rendering system, generating mip maps if appropriate.
load() - Method in class sage.terrain.AbstractHeightMap
load populates the height map data.
load() - Method in class sage.terrain.FaultFractalHeightMap
load generates the heightfield using the Fault Fractal algorithm.
load() - Method in class sage.terrain.HillHeightMap
Generates a heightmap using the Hill Raising Algorithm and the attributes set by the constructor or the setters.
load() - Method in class sage.terrain.ImageBasedHeightMap
This method does nothing because the image data defining the ImageBasedHeightMap is loaded at construction time; the method is provided simply to satisfy the contract of the parent class AbstractHeightMap.
load() - Method in class sage.terrain.MidPointHeightMap
load generates the heightfield using the Midpoint Displacement algorithm.
loadFile(String) - Static method in class sage.util.VersionInfo
Returns lines from a file, one line per element of the returned array of Strings.
loadMaterial(BufferedReader) - Method in class sage.model.loader.OBJMaterial
Loads material data from the specified BufferedReader (file).
loadMaterial() - Method in class sage.model.loader.OBJMaterial
 
loadMaterial(BufferedReader) - Method in class sage.scene.Material
Loads this material with data from the specified BufferedReader (normally a wrapper around a file).
loadMaterial() - Method in class sage.scene.Material
Loads this material with data from an internally-determined source (for example, prompts for the name of a material definition file and loads from that file).
loadModel(String) - Method in interface sage.model.loader.IModelLoader
Reads the specified file, which is presumed to contain an object model in a format understood by the loadModel() method, and returns a TriMesh object containing the data describing the mode.
loadModel(String) - Method in class sage.model.loader.OBJLoader
loadModel receives a String, assumed to be the name of a file containing a 3D model in WaveFront OBJ format; it reads the OBJ file and returns a TriMesh object containing the OBJ model data.
loadModel(String, String, String) - Method in class sage.model.loader.ogreXML.OgreXMLParser
This method loads an OgreXML model and returns a Group of Model3DTriMeshes.

loadModel(String, String, String, String, Texture.ApplyMode) - Method in class sage.model.loader.ogreXML.OgreXMLParser
This method loads an OgreXML model and returns a Group of Model3DTriMeshes.
loadShaderSource(String) - Method in class sage.shader.ShaderProgram
This helper function is used to transform the contents of a file into an array of Strings used by the graphics compiler.
loadTexture(GL2) - Method in class sage.scene.Model3DTriMesh
This method loads the Texture associated with this model.
loadTexture(GL2, int, int, int, int) - Method in class sage.scene.Model3DTriMesh
This method loads the Texture associated with this model and gives finer control of how the model's Texture is filtered.
loadTexture2D(String) - Static method in class sage.texture.TextureManager
Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified file and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
loadTexture2D(InputStream) - Static method in class sage.texture.TextureManager
Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified InputStream and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
loadTexture2D(URL) - Static method in class sage.texture.TextureManager
Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using default values for the Texture.MinificationFilter and Texture.MagnificationFilter settings.
loadTexture2D(URL, Texture.MinificationFilter, Texture.MagnificationFilter) - Static method in class sage.texture.TextureManager
Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified URL and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.
loadTexture2D(String, Texture.MinificationFilter, Texture.MagnificationFilter) - Static method in class sage.texture.TextureManager
Loads into the texture cache a Texture object using the image data contained in the specified file and using the specified Texture.MinificationFilter and and Texture.MagnificationFilter modes.

LookDownAction - Class in sage.input.action
An IAction which rotates a camera in the negative direction about its local "U" (X) axis (that is, it applies a "pitch" action to the camera in the downward direction).

LookUpAction - Class in sage.input.action
